title: Cutting the queue
creator_credit: Richard Costain Film Unit and British Information Services
brief_description: Gives a comprehensive survey of the work of British civil engineers involved in the construction of the Apapa Wharf extension at Lagos, which was needed to cope with the rapid expansion of Nigeria’s import and export trade.
creator_credit_for_label: Richard Costain Film Unit and British Information Services
